channel.title: [~showoff~]Dragon skill cape by pkboy[~showoff~] please review
channel.description:
[b]post if you look please[/b] [b]hi my name is pkboy886 i am pkboy but the name was taken anyway ill say my credit's/thanks to the people who helped me [ul][li]Senne teddy for the dragon Armour looks good (his topic-->[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,330214.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,330214.0.html[/url])[/li] [li]Silentcj for cape
Here, the colours are funny looking so it is easier to tell which part of the skillcape you are recolouring. http://uppit.com/v/GX41KDD8
[/li] [li]Silentcj again for when i asked him to help me he said no when i make my models i didn't have any tuts and he believed in me! well.. sorta[/li][/ul] [b]before you see it please realize that this is my first model so go easy on me :) here it is[/b] without model [URL=http://img530.imageshack.us/i/dragcapebypkboy1.png/][IMG]http://img530.imageshack.us/img530/1534/dragcapebypkboy1.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img530/dragcapebypkboy1.png/1/][IMG]http://img530.imageshack.us/img530/dragcapebypkboy1.png/1/w747.png[/img][/URL] with model [img]http://img160.imageshack.us/img160/2176/dragcapebypkboy2.png[/img] with dragon model [URL=http://img160.imageshack.us/i/dragcapebypkboy3.png/][IMG]http://img160.imageshack.us/img160/6746/dragcapebypkboy3.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img160/dragcapebypkboy3.png/1/][IMG]http://img160.imageshack.us/img160/dragcapebypkboy3.png/1/w742.png[/img][/URL] [b]i haven't made ints because well i don't know how.. and I'm gunna release if i get good comments i don't mind and bad comments but its my first one.. so be nice please :)[/b]

item.title: [~showoff~]Dragon skill cape by pkboy[~showoff~] please review
item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

[quote=“asdjf, post:54, topic:299312”]LOL and the idea of a rsps isnt a violation of copyright? GTFO off this post it your not gonna add something worthy too it…

Gj on the models keep it up dude :][/quote]
If you had half a brain, You would see the date on this topic. Also you need to GTFO this topic, The point of a RSPS is purely knowledge and that does not violate the law, Only by claiming someone Else’s work. We want to break away from JaGeX by making our own things, and coding our own servers. Slowly we are doing this. We want to see people with skills, Not copy and paste skills, Those will only get you so far. Yes, Badger41 has added something worthy, Unlike you.
